name: Math rush (ableflyer)
description:
Math rush, a game to improve and test your mental math skills, has arrived.

Play a game with a starting time of 60 seconds. Each time you get a correct answer, the time will shrink, get one wrong, or lose time, and you lose a life, lose all 3 of it and you're out.

You can also practice your skills with practice mode, change the practice settings to your main goal and keep practicing until you get the hang of it.

And to the parents and teachers who want to give a task to the children but they are busy, no worries because we have a parent feature, link a child account to the parent account and set tasks like:
- Beat your current high score
- Get a total score of [ ]
- Get a Score of [ ]
and many more...

we are currently working on more features for the game to give the user a better gaming experience
